name: PPTX Builder
slogan: Data visualisation application for Market Research industry
description: Our product is an online data visualisation app designed specifically for the market research industry.

jobs.title: Full Stack Devloper [React/Python]
jobs.description:
Must be based in London and available to at our office in West Kensington.

About us:
PPTX Builder is a London based start-up specialising in data visualization and report automation. Our technology enables users to extract key insights in client ready presentations. 

The role:
We are looking for a Full Stack Developer (Python/React) to deliver an outstanding data visualisation platform. You will be fully involved in the product road map creation and product delivery. Your work will range from simple frontend bug repairs to building and integrating complex APIs. 

Requirements:
•	Excellent knowledge and 3+ years of commercial experience working at a master level using Python 3, Flask, React and JavaScript
•	Modern JavaScript development tools and libraries
•	Experience with a common Python and JavaScript libraries (Highcharts, Pandas)
•	Experience with Bootstrap
•	Experience or high level understanding of code testing methodologies

Tech we use:
•	Server-side: Flask 
•	Client-side: React.js, Bootstrap, JQuery, HTML, CSS, Scss 
•	Languages: Python 3, JavaScript
•	Data visualization & analysis: Highcharts, Pandas, Openpyxl, Xlrd
•	Database: PostgreSQL 
•	Deployment: Heroku

Qualities we look for:
•	Positivity, determination to succeed, high energy with humility and a strong personal drive
•	Sound judgement along with a desire to challenge traditional thinking
•	Highly organised with a flexible approach to working
•	A very strong work ethic and a focus on delivery
•	Appreciation for a test-driven, code-review culture

What we offer:
•	A competitive salary
•	25 days holiday
•	The opportunity to contribute to and shape our vision, culture & growth

We look forward to hearing from you. Email CVs with a cover letter to info@pptxbuilder.com
